room_title: Escape room "The Bermuda Triangle Escape" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
review: We had SO much fun!!!! What a great place with a great staff.

room_title: Escape room "The Bermuda Triangle Escape" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
review: It was the perfect place for team building. our 6 managers were able to solve clues together. even though we failed to get out on time, it couldn't have worked out any better. We already new we were a great team, but this rewarding experience was a fun way to connect away from the workplace. Had an amazing time!!

room_title: Escape room "The Bermuda Triangle Escape" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
review: It was so fun! Well run, great puzzles, amazing set up, and friendly staff. Will definitely be going back!
